thread.section_title: BOSS LASER Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BOSS LASER | bosslaser.com
thread.title: Joe Beai
thread.title_full: BOSS LASER reviewed by Joe Beai

author: Joe Beai
title: Joe Beai
text: Could not be happier with the service that we received from Mike. He was very knowledgeable and went above and beyond anything that we could have expected. I read the reviews about Boss Laser before I purchased and was pleased with the comments that were posted about their service. I am pleased to say that they didn't say enough positive about it. I can heartily recommend Boss and especially Mike. He is a superior service tech in every sense of the word.
